attributes.action: All foreign students currently in U.K.  benefit from two years post study permit
attributes.additional_details: The Government should ensure that all foreign student who enrolled after the prime minister’s speech in 2019 should benefit.
attributes.background: The new U.K. two years post study visa has been launched but to only benefit Autumn 2020 starters. Therefore students who began their studies January , 2020 would not benefit. This is unfair as the speech by the Prime Minister in 2019 states that international students would now benefit from it.
